overview:
Mr. King focuses on identifying private equity investments and their respective due diligence processes. He is a member of the General Partner of FCA III and FCA IV, serving on the investment committees. Prior to joining Clayton Associates, Mr. King served as Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of My Office Products, Inc. Mr. King previously served as a Vice President of Third National Bank and its successor, SunTrust Bank, in Nashville, Tennessee from 1983 to 1989. Mr. King acquired Radar Business Systems in 1990, which was subsequently purchased by U.S. Office Products, Inc. in 1996, and served as the Regional Vice President for the successor company until 1998.

Mr. King currently serves on the Board of Directors of Intechra Holding Corporation, My Office Products, Inc., The Thalerus Group, Inc., and Tenvera, Inc., each of which is a company in the Clayton Associates portfolio.

relationships.title: Managing Director of FCA Venture Partners
